SELECT od.id, od.operation_id, od.item_id, od.item_status,
o.id AS operation_id, o.status AS operation_status,
i.id AS item_id, i.name AS item_name
FROM operation_details od LEFT JOIN operation o ON od.operation_id = o.id LEFT JOIN item i ON od.item_id = i.id WHERE od.item_id = #{itemId}
